name: v1.1.0
body:
- update to official driver v1.9.0
- add ut and comments for batchsize #236

name: v1.0.7
body:
- Fix #226
- Fix #212 , support options for Database()
- Fix #225, support whole index options for Index opetions like `Createindex()` And `EnsureIndex()`
Notes: from this version, use `Unique`、`Background`、`Sparse` and `ExpireAfterSeconds` in `options.IndexOptions` instead of `IndexModel`
```go
type IndexModel struct {
	Key []string // Index key fields; prefix name with dash (-) for descending order
	*options.IndexOptions
}
```
[example](https://github.com/qiniu/qmgo/blob/master/collection_test.go#L85):
```go
	indexOpts := officialOpts.Index()
	indexOpts.SetUnique(true).SetExpireAfterSeconds(expireS)
	ast.NoError(cli.CreateOneIndex(context.Background(), options.IndexModel{Key: unique, IndexOptions: indexOpts}))
```

name: v1.0.6
body: #223 upgrade to MongoDB official driver v1.8.2

name: v1.0.5
body: Fix #216, upgrade to mongo-go-driver v1.8.0

name: v1.0.4
body:
Fix:
#209 add options(createcollections_options files),support abundant options(like Time Series) in mongodb5.x version

name: v1.0.3
body:
NOTICE：
In this release, The `hook` feature need context as the first parameter, otherwise it will not work after(include)  v1.0.3.
You can check the readme or UT codes for more information.

Fix issues:
#198 fix data race problem in official driver 
#197 add context parameter in middleware

name: v1.0.2
body:
Fix issues: 
#192 
#167

name: v1.0.1
body: - Update MongoDB official driver to v1.7.1

name: v1.0.0
body:
The master branch is used by many repos and works stably in our production environment for half year.
And I think all the features required by v1.0.0 have been implemented.
So publish v1.0.0.

name: v0.9.4
body:
Fix #169 by #170 
Use `DoTransaction` without admin authentication

name: v0.9.3
body: fix #171

name: v0.9.2
body:
- Fix fieldName typo #162 
- Options when Aggregation #163

name: v0.9.1
body:
Fix #141 
Fix #147 ,  the type of parameter options is changed in API `NewClient()` and  `Open()`,

**Before** :
```go
    import  "go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver/mongo/options"

    opt := options.Client().SetAppName("example")
    cli, err := Open(ctx, &Config{Uri: URI, Database: DATABASE, Coll: COLL}, opt)
```

**After**:
```go
import (
	"github.com/qiniu/qmgo/options"
	opts "go.mongodb.org/mongo-driver/mongo/options"
)
	opt := opts.Client().SetAppName("example")
	cli, err := Open(ctx, &Config{Uri: URI, Database: DATABASE, Coll: COLL}, options.ClientOptions{ClientOptions: opt})
```

name: v0.9.0
body: #145   support plugin

name: v0.8.2
body:
#137 add DropAllIndexes func 
#139 refactor to middleware to support field、hook and more
#142 support RunCommand
#143 support Qmgo tags for struct validation

name: v0.8.1
body:
#129 fix Query.Sort() erroring later if field list is empty 
#130 fix IsDup(nil) panicking 
#133 fix custom field setId bug 
#135 Update no such document error

name: v0.8.0
body:
- Support All official Mongo-go-driver options in Insert/Update/Upsert/Replace/Remove API
- Split implement of hook interface to before hook and after hook, user only need to implement one interface function when only need before hook or after hook

name: v0.7.8
body:
- Support UpsertId
- Support UpdateId
- Enlarge Ping timeout 
- Support Hint() when Find

name: v0.7.7
body:
fix #114 
Distinct() could not work when different types of values

name: v0.7.6
body: - fix error in Find().Apply()

name: v0.7.5
body:
- Add API: Find().Apply()
- Add copyright

name: v0.7.4
body:
- Support new options to indexes operation
```
	Unique             bool     // Prevent two documents from having the same index key
	Background         bool     // Build index in background and return immediately
	Sparse             bool     // Only index documents containing the Key fields
	ExpireAfterSeconds *int32   // Periodically delete docs with indexed time.Time older than that.
```
- Introduce new API CreateOneIndex and CreateIndexes,
- Deprecated EnsureIndexes

name: v0.7.3
body: UpdateWithDocument rename to ReplaceOne

name: v0.7.2
body: Upsert support fields

name: v0.7.1
body:
- New API `UpdateWithDocument`
- Support automatically default and custom fields
- Hooks without options in `InsertOne` 、`InsertMany` and `UpdateWithDocument`

name: v0.7.0
body:
- Support Hooks
- Support all options when connect
- Support InsertMany([]UserType)

name: v0.6.2
body: predefine operator keys

name: v0.6.1
body:
- Connect database with auth
- Support dropindexes

name: v0.6.0
body:
In this release, qmgo support
- Transactions
- Pool monitor、minPoolSize
- Readpref

name: v0.5.3
body: support NewObjectID()、RemoveId()、IsErrNoDocuments()

name: v0.5.2
body: Update() rename to UpdateOne()

name: v0.5.1
body:
- remove function `NewDatabase`
- add function `now()` for same behavior like `mgo`

name: v0.5.0
body:
Support features:
- CRUD to documents
- Create indexes
- Sort、limit、count、select
- Cursor
- Aggregate
